src:
PKS DKI Mengaku Belum Tahu Gerindra Usulkan 4 Cawagub Pendamping Anies
07 Nov 2019, 23:06 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - DPW PKS DKI Jakarta mengaku belum mengetahui Partai Gerindra mengusulkan empat nama baru sebagai calon Wakil Gubernur DKI Jakarta. PKS menyerahkannya kepada DPP PKS.
"Belum tahu saya. Tanya ke Pak Sohibul Iman (Presiden PKS). Kan DPP, kalau saya jawab (nanti) salah," ucap Ketua Dewan Syuro DPW PKS DKI Jakarta Abdurrahman Suhaimi saat dihubungi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Sebelumnya, Partai Gerindra mengubah usulan nama yang diusung untuk menduduki kursi cawagub DKI. Gerindra kini mengusulkan empat nama cawagub DKI Jakarta ke DPP PKS.
"Benar (mengajukan surat). (Namanya) Arnes Lukman, Ferry J Yuliantoro, A Riza Patria, Saefullah (Sekda DKI Jakarta)," ucap Ketua DPD Gerindra DKI Jakarta, Muhammad Taufik, saat dihubungi, Kamis (7/11).
Taufik mengatakan Gerindra mengajukan empat nama karena proses pemilihan Wakil Gubernur DKI Jakarta macet lebih dari satu tahun. Maka, menurutnya, tidak salah jika Gerindra mengusulkan nama pengganti Sandiaga Uno.
"Kemarin dua nama macet. Maka yang diperlukan adalah, pertama, jangan-jangan figur yang nggak... DPRD kurang menerima atau komunikasi. Dua itu saja, pertimbangan. Ya sudahlah, kita usulkan, dari kita ada, dari PKS ada," ucap Taufik.

(aik/dnu)
text:
DKI PKS Claims It Doesn't Know Gerindra Proposes 4 Vice Chancellors of Anies
Nov 7 2019, 23:06 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - DPW PKS DKI Jakarta claimed not to know the Gerindra Party proposed four new names as a candidate for Deputy Governor of DKI Jakarta. PKS handed it over to PKP DPP.
"I do not know yet. Ask Mr. Sohibul Iman (PKS President). The DPP, if I answer (later) is wrong," said Chairman of the Jakarta PKW PKS Syuro Council Abdurrahman Suhaimi when contacted on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Previously, the Gerindra Party changed the proposed name to carry the seat of Jakarta Vice Governor. Gerindra is now proposing four names of DKI Jakarta vice governor to PKS DPP.
"Right (filing a letter). (His name) Arnes Lukman, Ferry J Yuliantoro, A Riza Patria, Saefullah (DKI Jakarta Secretary)," said Chairman of DKI Jakarta Gerindra DPD, Muhammad Taufik, when contacted on Thursday (7/11).
Taufik said Gerindra submitted four names because the process of electing the Deputy Governor of DKI Jakarta stalled for more than one year. So, according to him, it is not wrong if Gerindra proposes a replacement name for Sandiaga Uno.
"Yesterday, two names were stuck. So what is needed is, first, lest the figures don't ... The DPRD is not receiving or communicating enough. Just two, considerations. Oh well, we propose, from us there, from PKS there," said Taufik.

(aik / dnu)
